statement.p: A carpet store charges 238.00 to install 68 square yards of carpet. Assuming they charge the same rate per square yard regardless of the amount of carpet installed, how much would they charge to install 200 square yards of carpet? Use the variable \displaystyle{x} in setting up the proportion.
What is the unit price for installation per square yard of carpet?

row.cell: They would charge to install 200 square yards of carpet.
